Title: Introduction and what you'll need for evaluating apprenticeship training

Pages.Title: Evaluating apprenticeship training
Pages.BodyText:
For this section, you'll need to know:

  • your organisation's process for evaluating the quality of training delivered
  • how your organisation's made improvements using this process
  • if this process includes apprenticeship training
  • how your organisation evaluates the quality for apprenticeship training
  • how your organisation reviews this process
  • if your organisation has systems and processes to collect apprenticeship data
  • if your organisation has the resources to submit Individualised Learner Record (ILR)
